task:
DESIGN: LAN USER SESSION ISOLATION

When users connect via LAN (WiFi), they need:
1. OWN SESSION - Separate from other users and admin
2. VISIBILITY - See swarm activity (what's running across the whole surface)
3. CLARITY - Know what THEY triggered vs what's happening separately
4. ISOLATION - Cannot affect host machine or other users' machines

DESIGN:
- Per-IP session management
- User workspace isolation
- Activity tagging (user-triggered vs background swarm)
- Real-time status showing: 'You
